summary: A young American soldier witnesses the horrors of the Great War.
cast: John Gilbert|Renée Adorée|Hobart Bosworth|Claire McDowell|Claire Adams|Robert Ober|Tom O'Brien|Karl Dane|Rosita Marstini|George Beranger|Harry Crocker|Julanne Johnston|Kathleen Key|Dan Mason|Carl 'Major' Roup|Carl Voss
director: Directors: King Vidor, George W. Hill (uncredited)
title: El gran desfile
